lenders.name: SAID SALIM
lenders.loan_because:
Dear Sir
I have been a tour guide all my life, and now I have an oppertunity  to run a project comprising  small bungalows on the beachside. All through my life i have never been able to save enough money. and i think this project of small bungalows would allow me and my family lead a decent life, without any more struggle. I have six chidlren and I wish to give them a good future. I would like to know from you, how i may apply for a loan through your site. Kindly guide me. Kind regards
The proposal - Hotel for rent.

Cost of the hotel for the entire year is  $ 2250
Cost of the hotel for 3 years   6x2250  $ 6750

The hotel consists of 3 rooms and 1 restaurant
Average cost of each room will be 187.5 per month    $   46.87

Other costs each month includes staff salary, electric
Equipments, incidental expenses, license cost   
For the entire hotel will be                                                     $ 650

Therefore 
Other costs per month /per room is    650/4 $162.50
Total cost per month/per room    46.87+162.50 $209.37
Considering 20 working days in a month
Our cost per room/per day is 209.37/20 $10.47
Total cost 4 rooms/per month $875
================================================================
Room Sales
Minimum sale price each room/per day $ 45

Sale price for 3 rooms/per day 3x45 $135

Minimum sales in restaurant/per day       $75

Total sales per day 135+75 $210
Considering 2o working days a month
Total sales of hotel for the month 20x210 $4200

Profit per month  4200- 875 $3325
lenders.occupational_info:
The proposal - Hotel for rent.

Cost of the hotel for the entire year is  $ 2250
Cost of the hotel for 3 years   6x2250  $ 6750
The hotel consists of 3 rooms and 1 restaurant
Average cost of each room will be 187.5 per month    $   46.87
Other costs each month includes staff salary, electric
Equipments, incidental expenses, license cost   
For the entire hotel will be                                                     $ 650
Therefore 
Other costs per month /per room is    650/4 $162.50
Total cost per month/per room    46.87+162.50 $209.37
Considering 20 working days in a month
Our cost per room/per day is 209.37/20 $10.47
Total cost 4 rooms/per month $875
================================================================
Room Sales
Minimum sale price each room/per day $ 45
Sale price for 3 rooms/per day 3x45 $135
Minimum sales in restaurant/per day       $75
Total sales per day 135+75 $210
Considering 2o working days a month
Total sales of hotel for the month 20x210 $4200
Profit per month  4200- 875 $3325

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I can. And it's nice to see how my money is being put to good use.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe in people and because I believe in Kiva. It's a simple but awesome idea. The initial 'seed money' you invest grows into fruit bearing assets for the borrower. They repay and your money can then be re lent to someone else. The cycle continues. If you spread your money across multiple borrowers by providing only a small amount of their loan request, you hedge your risk.

lenders.occupational_info: stressful,interesting,and we learn everyday something new.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs that truely need assistance in less fortunate countries. This program is well respected and I wanted to be part of this great cause.
lenders.occupational_info: I work full time at a leading Honda Powerhouse Dealership. I own and operate a small Online Business selling parts for late model Honda Products.

lenders.name: Daureen
lenders.loan_because: I prefer to invest in individuals, especially those trying to improve the standard of living and education of their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: "Do unto others as you would have done to you."

lenders.name: Nathaniel
lenders.loan_because: People deserve opportunities.

lenders.name: Darcelle Runciman
lenders.loan_because: I care about people, and want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I own an online business that promotes a balanced world, mind, and heart. I also mentor small business owners and entrepreneurs on how to develop their businesses.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.occupation: Supervisor Of Guest Services and Operations

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: When we travel over the world we meet so many  nice people. If we loan money we can do something back for people who need it!

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: I am.

lenders.name: Nathaniel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Christian Nilsson
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best and most efficient way to give aid to the third world

lenders.name: Jurgen
lenders.loan_because: On our bicycle trip we encountered many friendly people who had little income. Lots of them wanted to work but had no chance. Micro credit can give that chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses to meet environmental standards.

lenders.name: Flo Critt Geog. Class
lenders.loan_because: We have studied microfinance in Geography class and thought it would be interesting to begin to fund someone in another part of the world. We are going to focus on women since we are a school for girls.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a high school for pregnant and parenting teen girls in Denver, CO.

lenders.name: Megan and Brandon
lenders.loan_because: Although we had looked at Kiva before, and thought that micro-lending was an amazing opportunity to reach out into the world, it was our brother-in-law Nathan who finally got us started with a gift certificate this holiday season.  Thanks, Nate!
lenders.occupational_info: Brandon is an artist and a professor of Fine Art at a university, and Megan is a student.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: It's not enough to say that more people should help out and care in this world. You have to actually be the one to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: Anthony Trott is an American Artist. He began as a sketch artist and has evolved into a Neo-expressionist painter. His artwork often contains elements meant to promote Social Awareness and Global Consciousness. Animal Rights and Welfare, Psychological Struggles, and Religion are often reoccurring themes. An Animal Activist, and Vegetarian, Anthony often donates his artwork, including murals, to Animal Shelters to help raise awareness and funds. Interested in the Street Art Movement and the purity of Graffiti, Anthony Trott has left many of his paintings and drawings places, such as Bus Stops, Parks, and Parking Lots, for people to admire and take freely if they so desire. This is often the last moment he knows of their existence. Going forward, Anthony is further refining his art, finding its life and path, and helping raise awareness of the beauty in the world which surrounds us.

lenders.name: Morgan
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of doing as much as possible to help others out, even if it is a little loan. Hopefully the availability of it spreads some love.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have a desire for all of us to improve our standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves the purchasing of products and services from developing countries.  I have seen and experienced firsthand much of what I read about on Kiva.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because:
I can..
We should focus on doing the next right thing, not doing the next thing right..
lenders.occupational_info: Hours of tiresome tediousness intersparsed with moments of shear terror..

lenders.name: Cinna
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great and simple way to make a difference in the world and give these entrepreneurs a fair chance of succeeding.
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own business as a graphic designer and production artist.

lenders.name: Alese
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to help women in other countries!

lenders.name: Rotary Club of Rocklin/Loomis Basin
lenders.loan_because: we want to foster sustainable, economic prosperity to the poor but highly motivated entrepreneurs worldwide
lenders.occupational_info: We are a community service club that wants to improve our world both locally and internationally.

lenders.name: Olivia
lenders.occupation: Kiva Fellows Program Intern/Server at Limon

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world.  I hope it creates a positive impact!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a homebuilder.

lenders.loan_because: Micro credit is the best way to give other people a chance in life!
lenders.occupational_info: Passions: Growing Trees and Plants, Backpacking in South America

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: together we can truly make a positive difference in people's lives.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: I hope to empower all of us to be less dependent on corporations and politicians; and to make a better world for our children!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach computer and IT skills to students in grades K-8. I coordinate our school's efforts to integrate technology into the regular classroom curriculum.

lenders.name: Ufirst
lenders.occupational_info: United First Financial pioneered the Money Merge Account system, which that combines powerful financial education with dynamic online tracking software,. UFirst is changing the financial landscape for thousands of individuals and families.

lenders.name: Andrei
lenders.loan_because: the only way we are going to progress as humans is by helping each other, leaving apart differences and starting to develop a real friendly, social planet.

lenders.name: June
lenders.loan_because: My primary goal is for the money to get to the folks who need it with little or no administrative costs eroding the good the funds can do!
lenders.occupational_info: I design risk protection programs through insurance and training both online and in person so employers can focus on their primary goals and not worry about problems, lawsuits, or unexpected costs interfering with their livelihoood.

lenders.name: jackie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: raised a family alone and am now retired.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: You'd help me, too, right?

lenders.name: Robert & Toos
lenders.loan_because: this really helps people get their own business off the ground, which helps them to be proud of who they are and what they do.
lenders.occupational_info: I help large corporations get the maximum use and value out of open source software. Open source software is software that everybody can see the source code for and can use for free.

lenders.name: Tilman
lenders.loan_because: with a comparatively small amount, I can help people to build existances. 25$ can't buy nearly as much in my country (Germany) as in many other countries... So it's better to lend it to people where it has more momentum...
lenders.occupational_info: I am working in a company building walls for toilets and other sanitary equipment and build the frames for those walls...

lenders.name: Korey
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Develop software.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I've seen that micro-lending is effective in helping to help alleviate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping to expand the reach of microfinance.

lenders.name: Kimberly M.
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I just graduated college and helping other young students in low-income high schools with high immigrant populations go to college too.

lenders.name: Byte
lenders.loan_because: Byte doneert een deel van haar omzet aan Kiva. Samen met onze klanten kunnen we de wereld een klein beetje beter proberen te maken.
lenders.occupational_info: Byte levert hosting diensten aan webdesigners en MKB bedrijven. We doen dit met PHP/MySQL (Joomla, Magento).

lenders.name: Luis Neves
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I want to see everyone become successful and because it feels good

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I make awesome software

lenders.name: Jayson
lenders.loan_because: Small business is what makes a real difference and it is exciting to see how the money is put to use.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people that need it. And it's not just a handout, since they're paying you back - it's a sign of faith and encouragement.
